field.label: Instant App ID
field.comment: Enter the Application ID provided by Instant

field.label: Instant Access Token
field.comment: Enter the Access Token provided by Instant (This is used to authenticate your API calls to Instant. IMPORTANT: This is private, do not make publicly available)

field.label: Is in Sandbox/Staging Environment
field.comment: Defaults to Yes. CRITICAL: Set to No if in LIVE/PRODUCTION environment. Set to Yes if this site is a SANDBOX/STAGING environment.
Important: Ensure config is correct and saved before activating Instant. Clicking this will send an access token to Instant, allowing Instant to make secure API calls to your store.

field.label: Disable Instant for products where the SKU contains the following specified phrases (provide a comma delimited list)
field.comment: Defaults to empty. Enter a comma delimited list. If a product's SKU contains any of phrases in this comma delimited list, then Instant will be disabled. (e.g. ABC,DEF will ensure Instant is disabled for all products where the SKU contains either ABC or DEF.) To enable Instant for all products, leave empty.

field.label: Disable Instant for specific customer groups (provide a comma delimited list of IDs)
field.comment: Defaults to empty. Enter a comma delimited list. Any customer group contained in this comma delimited list, will have Instant disabled (e.g. 1,2 will ensure Instant is disabled for all customers in groups with ID 1 or 2.)

field.label: Enable Cookie Forwarding
field.comment: *Experimental* Defaults to no. Provides Instant with cookies on page load which enables support for cookie based functionality like affiliate plugins.

field.label: Retry failures cron schedule
field.comment: Schedule for resending failed requests - default is */5 * * * *

field.label: Retry failure count
field.comment: Number of attempts to retry failed requests to Instant. Default is 3

field.label: Width of minicart button
field.comment: Defaults to 90%. (%) Low values may cause visual glitching.

field.label: Width of checkout page button
field.comment: Defaults to 60%. (%) Low values may cause visual glitching.

field.label: Should resize Instant cart summary button to primary proceed button
field.comment: Defaults to yes.

field.label: Border radius of buttons
field.comment: Defaults to 3. (in px, provide an integer. min 0, max 10)

field.label: Height of buttons
field.comment: Defaults to 45. (in px, provide an integer. min 40, max 50)

field.label: Color of Instant buttons. In HEX (e.g. #RRGGBB)
field.comment: Defaults to #00D160.

field.label: Should resize Instant PDP button to Add to Cart button
field.comment: Defaults to yes.

field.label: Should position Instant PDP button below Add to Cart button
field.comment: Defaults to no.

field.label: Custom style for PDP button
field.comment: e.g. margin-top:10px;margin-bottom:10px

field.label: Custom style for PDP button container
field.comment: e.g. margin-top:10px;margin-bottom:10px

field.label: Setting for repositioning the PDP button before or after a div
field.comment: Provide in the format {AFTER or BEFORE}|{element selector} e.g. AFTER|.product-social-links will reposition the PDP button after the HTML element matching the selector .product-social-links"

field.label: Setting for repositioning the PDP button as first or last element within a parent div
field.comment: Provide in the format {PREPEND or APPEND}|{element selector} e.g. PREPEND|.product-info-price will reposition the PDP button as the first element within the div matching the selector .product-info-price"

field.label: Move OR strike to above the Instant PDP button
field.comment: Defaults to no. By default, the OR strike is below the Instant PDP button. Setting this to yes will reposition it above the PDP button.

field.label: Custom style for minicart button
field.comment: e.g. margin-top:10px;margin-bottom:10px

field.label: Custom style for outer minicart button container
field.comment: e.g. margin-top:10px;margin-bottom:10px

field.label: Hide OR strike for minicart button
field.comment: Defaults to no.

field.label: Custom style for cart index button
field.comment: e.g. margin-top:10px;margin-bottom:10px

field.label: Custom style for outer cart index button container
field.comment: e.g. margin-top:10px;margin-bottom:10px

field.label: Hide OR strike for cart index button
field.comment: Defaults to no.

field.label: Google Analytics Version
field.comment: 3 for UA, 4 for GA4

field.label: Measurement ID or Tracking ID
field.comment: If GA3/UA, then tracking ID e.g. UA-000000-2 should be specified. If GA4, measurement ID e.g. G-XXXXXXX should be specified.
